name: listRemoveDuplicates
description: Removes duplicate values (if they exist) in a list.

params.name: delimiter
params.description: Optional. Character(s) that separate list elements. The default value is comma.

params.name: ignoreCase
params.description: Optional. If true, ignores the case of strings in the list. By default the value is set to false.

examples.title: Basic usage (case-sensitive)
examples.description: Basic usage. Optional arguments left as defaults.

examples.title: Optional arguments usage (ignore case = true)
examples.description: Optional arguments being set. Ignore case set to true
